Arg.V:
#!/bin/bash
function updatepk() { if [ ! -z $1 ]; then if [ -e /var/run/yum.pid ];then exit 10 fi result=`yum -y update $1 2>&1` status=$? commandexist=`echo $result | grep -E "yum: command not found"` if [ "$commandexist" != "" ]; then exit 8 fi
commandexist=`echo $result | grep -E "yum: No such file or directory"` if [ "$commandexist" != "" ]; then exit 8 fi
islock=`echo $result | grep -E "lock /var/run/yum.pid"`
if [ "$islock" != "" ]; then exit 10 fi
islock=`echo $result | grep -E "/var/run/yum.pid: another copy is running"`
if [ "$islock" != "" ]; then exit 10 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "There was an error communicating with RHN"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "This system is not registered with RHN"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "No Repositories Available to Set Up"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "Error Class Code: 9 Error Class Info: Invalid System Credentials"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isscriptletfailed=`echo $result | grep -E "error:" | grep -E "scriptlet failed, exit status 255"` if [ "$isscriptletfailed" != "" ]; then exit 6 fi if [ $status -ne 0 ];then exit 7 fi fi } updatepk compat-glew
exit 0

isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "This system is not registered with RHN"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "No Repositories Available to Set Up"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "Error Class Code: 9 Error Class Info: Invalid System Credentials"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isscriptletfailed=`echo $result | grep -E "error:" | grep -E "scriptlet failed, exit status 255"` if [ "$isscriptletfailed" != "" ]; then exit 6 fi if [ $status -ne 0 ];then exit 7 fi fi } updatepk xorg-x11-xkb-utils-devel
exit 0

exit 0

Vulnerability.Title: xorg-x11 bug fix and enhancement update
Vulnerability.Description: X.Org is an open source implementation of the X Window System. It provides the basic low-level functionality that full-fledged graphical user interfaces are designed upon. The xorg-x11 library packages, as well as many supporting packages, have been upgraded to newer upstream versions, which provide a number of bug fixes and enhancements over the previous versions: The glew packages have been updated to version 1.10.0. (BZ#1207776) The libdrm library has been updated to version 2.4.60. (BZ#1194843) The libfontenc library has been updated to version 1.1.2. (BZ#1194844) The libICE library has been updated to version 1.0.9. (BZ#1194845) The libpciaccess library has been updated to version 0.13.4. (BZ#1194846) The libSM library has been updated to version 1.2.2. (BZ#1194847) The libwacom library has been updated to version 0.12. (BZ#1194848) The libX11 library has been updated to version 1.6.3. (BZ#1194849) The libXaw library has been updated to version 1.0.12. (BZ#1194850) The libxcb library has been updated to version 1.11. (BZ#1194851) The libXext library has been updated to version 1.3.3. (BZ#1194852) The libXfont library has been updated to version 1.5.1. (BZ#1194853) The libXft library has been updated to version 2.3.2. (BZ#1194854) The libXi library has been updated to version 1.7.4. (BZ#1194855) The libXmu library has been updated to version 1.1.2. (BZ#1194856) The libXpm library has been updated to version 3.5.11. (BZ#1194857) The libXrandr library has been updated to version 1.4.2. (BZ#1194858) The libXv library has been updated to version 1.0.10. (BZ#1194859) The mtdev packages have been updated to version 1.1.5. (BZ#1194863) The pixman packages have been updated to version 0.32.6. (BZ#1194864) The xcb-proto package has been updated to version 1.11. (BZ#1194865) The xcb-util packages have been updated to version 0.4.0. (BZ#1194866) The xcb-util-image packages have been updated to version 0.4.0. (BZ#1194867) The xcb-util-keysyms packages have been updated to version 0.4.0. (BZ#1194868) The xcb-util-renderutil packages have been updated to version 0.3.9. (BZ#1194869) The xcb-util-wm packages have been updated to version 0.4.1. (BZ#1194870) The xkeyboard-config package has been updated to version 2.14. (BZ#1194871) The xorg-x11-proto-devel package has been updated to version 7.7. (BZ#1194890) The xorg-x11-server-utils packages have been updated to version 7.7. (BZ#1194891) The xorg-x11-util-macros package has been updated to version 1.19.0. (BZ#1194892) The xorg-x11-xauth packages have been updated to version 1.0.9. (BZ#1194893) The xorg-x11-xinit packages have been updated to version 1.3.4. (BZ#1194894) The xorg-x11-xkb-utils packages have been updated to version 7.7. (BZ#1194895) The xorg-x11-xtrans-devel package has been updated to version 1.3.5. (BZ#1194896) This update also fixes the following bugs: Previously, the libfontenc library did not search for the encoding files in the correct place. Consequently, the luit filter was not able to handle EUC-JP encoding in GNOME terminal. With this update, libfontenc has been patched to properly look for encodings. As a result, luit is now able to handle EUC-JP encoding in GNOME terminal. (BZ#1093788) Previously, when using a remote gdm session and then running the "ssh -X" command, the following warning was printed: Warning: No xauth data; using fake authentication data for X11 forwarding. Afterwards, X applications started from within the SSH session did not work. With this update, the xauth utility has been fixed to deal with cookies reliably, and running "ssh -X" from within a remote gdm session now works as expected. (BZ#1127028) Users of xorg-x11 are advised to upgrade to these updated packages, which fix these bugs and add these enhancements. Note for remediation: Please disable the SELinux for RHEL 4/5 when repairing, or some rpm packages will fail to install.
